posts.post_content:
I am looking to part ways with my 1887 N28 Charles Comiskey graded a BVG 3. 

I would like $750 or willing to entertain all trades.

I have been getting many offers regarding trades.  I think it may be best if I gave more detail regarding trades.

I am looking for Pre WW2 cards from well-known Hall of Famers.  I would like to do a single higher-end card for a trade for the Comiskey and would be interested in adding the Timohty Keefe graded a 4 too if interested (see my other fs/ft ad in this forum).  I love T206, Goudey, T227, N300, N28, N29, Ramly, Mayo Plug, Cracker Jack, Old Judge, and Goodwin, etc.

Take care and thank you for all of the inquiries!
